text:
Pysocial CLI help menu
Type `help <command>` for help with a specific command

add.text:
Adds a node or group of nodes to the network
Syntax: `add <node> [additional nodes]`

naming.text: Node names can consist of multiple characters - surround multi-character names with single-quotes, or use \ to escape the spaces. Also use \ to escape semicolon (;) characters.
